channel.title: 期末作業 on Learn Javascript
channel.description: Recent content in 期末作業 on Learn Javascript

item.title: 計算機
item.description: 預計 節省時間 展開 原始碼(preset.html) <html> <head> <style> </style> <script> </script> </head> <body> <input type="textarea" id="scr"> <input type="button" value="(" > <input type="button" value=")" > <input type="button" value="%" > <input type="button" value="C" > <input type="button" value="7" > <input type="button" value="8" > <input type="button" value="9" > <input type="button" value="/" > <input type="button" value="4" > <input type="button" value="5" > <input type="button" value="6" > <input type="button" value="*" > <input type="button" value="1" > <input type="button" value="2" > <input type="button" value="3" > <input type="button" value="-" > <input type="button" value="0" > <input type="button" value=".

item.title: 計算機
item.description: 另一個計算機 展開 原始碼(mycalculator.html) <html> <head> <!--10vw 10％ of view port--> <style> .button{ width:25%; height:15%; margin:0px; padding:0px; border:0px; float:left; font-size: 8vw; box-shadow: inset 0 0 12px black; } .special{ width:25%; height:15%; margin:0px; padding:0px; border:0px; float:left; font-size:8vw; background-color: #92dc31; color: #e80c0c; box-shadow: inset 0 0 12px black; } input.screen{ width: 100%; height: 25%; background-color: #9E9E9E; font-size: 10vw; font-weight: bold; text-align:right; } </style> <script> function cc(e){ var s=scr.value; if (s.length>0 && ((s.lastIndexOf('%')+1)==s.length) && Number.
